name: Trifox
description:
Trifox, A twin-stick action-adventure game inspired by classic platformers
Embark on an epic adventureIn Trifox you play as a multitalented hero on a quest to restore his recently invaded and plundered home.
Fight your way through swarms of enemies, engage in thrilling boss fights and overcome exciting environmental challenges as you discover that there is more to your quest than meets the eye …
Pick and fine-tune your playstyleMix and match between three different and unique playstyles.
Experiment; combine and discover new ways of dealing with your foes!
